job.title: Malware Removal from Cloud Based Windows Server
job.description:
We are looking for an experienced professional to help us remove malware from our cloud based windows server. The server has been affected by malware and we need someone with expertise in malware removal to quickly and efficiently eliminate the threat. The ideal candidate should have a deep understanding of cloud based windows servers and be familiar with various malware removal techniques. Attention to detail and the ability to work under pressure are crucial for this project. If you have a track record of successfully removing malware from similar servers, we would love to hear from you.

Skills required:
- IIS
- Malware removal
- Cloud based windows servers
- Attention to detail
- Problem-solving
- Time management
-  Microsoft .net
- Microsoft SQL Server
